    • Method Detail

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(String message)
        Description copied from interface: UI
        Set a message to show the player the next time UI.refresh(GameState) is called. This message should be shown as a non-error message.
        Specified by:
        setMessage in interface UI
        Parameters:
        message - message to show the player

      • setErrorMessage

        public void setErrorMessage(String message)
        Description copied from interface: UI
        Set an error message to show the player the next time UI.refresh(GameState) is called. This message should be shown as an error.
        Specified by:
        setErrorMessage in interface UI
        Parameters:
        message - error message to show the player

      • refresh

        public void refresh(GameState gameState)
        Description copied from interface: UI
        Signals to the UI implementation that the game state has changed. The UI may or may not refresh more often.
        Specified by:
        refresh in interface UI
        Parameters:
        gameState - the game state to be visualized by the UI

      • refreshAndRequestMove

        public String refreshAndRequestMove(GameState gameState,
                                    Collection<Move> moves)
        Description copied from interface: UI
        Signals to the UI implementation that the game state has changed, and that player input is expected. The UI may or may not refresh more often.
        Specified by:
        refreshAndRequestMove in interface UI
        Parameters:
        gameState - the game state to be visualized by the UI
        moves - the moves that are possible in this game state
        Returns:
        String representation of the player request
